UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-Activity Relationship-based Optimization of Small Temporin-SHf Analogs with Potent Antibacterial Activity
Literature.Author: André S, Washington SK, Darby E, Vega MM, Filip AD, Ash NS, Muzikar KA, Piesse C, Foulon T, O'Leary DJ, Ladram A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=12.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=12.5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-44(MIC=6.25µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=3µM),Listeria ivanovii(MIC=6.25µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=50µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>100µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=>100µM),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=25µM)
